definition.content:
**Mailchimp** is an all-in-one marketing platform that helps businesses create, send, and analyze email campaigns. It provides tools for audience management, marketing automation, and insights to drive engagement and grow your business.

This Mailchimp **Campaign** Dashboard provides comprehensive insights, including total campaigns, email performance, click rates, open rates, bounce rates, unsubscriptions, and abuse reports, with latest metrics showcasing consolidated statistics for the campaigns sent in last 30 days.

For more information, see the [Mailchimp Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/mailchimp/).

**Note**:
- The dashboard widgets show the latest metric values captured for each campaign sent during the last 30 days.
- Campaigns sent before 30 days will not tracked in the dashboard.


**Tip**:
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Top Campaigns by Email Sent (Last 30 days)
Top 10 Abuse Reports By Campaign (Last 30 days)
